text.div:
Id: us-ecr-specification
Url: http://ersd.aimsplatform.org/fhir/PlanDefinition/us-ecr-specification
Version: 2022.1.0
Name: US_eCR_Specification
Title: US eCR Specification
Status: active
Experimental: true
Type:

system: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/plan-definition-type

code: workflow-definition

display: Workflow Definition

Date: 2023-03-31 12:32:29-0500
Publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Description: An example ersd PlanDefinition
Jurisdiction: US
Effective Period: 2020-12-01..
Related Artifacts:

Dependencies

  • http://ersd.aimsplatform.org/fhir/Library/rctc
Libraries:
http://fhir.org/guides/cdc/opioid-cds/Library/OpioidCDSREC11
Actions:
Start the reporting workflow in response to an encounter-start event
When: named-event: encounter-start
Then:
Check suspected disorders for immediate reportability and setup jobs for future reportability checks.
Then:
Check Trigger Codes based on Suspected Reportable and Lab Order Test Names Value set.
If: applicability: (%suspectedDisorderConditions.exists() or %suspectedDisorderLabOrders.exists())
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%inprogressencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours >= now())).select(true))
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%terminatedencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration < now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours < now())).select(true))
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%lateCompletedEncounter.exists(status = 'finished'))
Then:
Check Reportability and setup jobs for future reportability checks.
Then:
Check Trigger Codes based on RCTC Value sets.
If: applicability: ((%encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now()) and (%conditions.exists() or %encounters.exists() or %immunizations.exists() or %labOrders.exists() or %labTests.exists() or %labResults.exists() or %medicationAdministrations.exists() or %medicationOrders.exists() or %medicationDispenses.exists()))
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%lastReportSubmissionDate < now() - 72 hours)
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%inprogressencounter.where(status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now() or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours >= now())).exists())
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%termencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration < now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours < now())).select(true))
Then:
:
If: applicability: (%completedEncounter.exists(status = 'finished'))
Then:
Create eICR
Then:
Validate eICR
Then:
Route and send eICR
Then:
Start the reporting workflow in response to an encounter-modified event
When: named-event: encounter-modified
If: applicability: (%encounter.where(period.start + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration < now()).select(true))
Then:

relatedArtifact.label: RCTC Value Set Library of Trigger Codes

action.description: This action represents the start of the reporting workflow in response to the encounter-start event.
action.textEquivalent: Start the reporting workflow in response to an encounter-start event

coding.display: Indicates the start of an encounter

action.description: This action represents the start of the check suspected disorder reporting workflow in response to the encounter-start event.
action.textEquivalent: Check suspected disorders for immediate reportability and setup jobs for future reportability checks.

action.description: This action represents the check for suspected disorder reportability to create the patients eICR.
action.textEquivalent: Check Trigger Codes based on Suspected Reportable and Lab Order Test Names Value set.

valueExpression.expression: Is Encounter In Progress and Within Normal Reporting Duration or 72h or less after end of encounter?

expression.expression: %inprogressencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours >= now())).select(true)
%terminatedencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration < now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours < now())).select(true)

action.description: This action represents the check for suspected reportability of the eICR.
action.textEquivalent: Check Reportability and setup jobs for future reportability checks.

action.description: This action represents the check for reportability to create the patients eICR.
action.textEquivalent: Check Trigger Codes based on RCTC Value sets.

valueExpression.expression: Is Encounter Reportable and Within Normal Reporting Duration?

expression.expression: (%encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now()) and (%conditions.exists() or %encounters.exists() or %immunizations.exists() or %labOrders.exists() or %labTests.exists() or %labResults.exists() or %medicationAdministrations.exists() or %medicationOrders.exists() or %medicationDispenses.exists())

valueExpression.expression: Most recent eICR sent over 72 hours ago?
Is Encounter In Progress and Within Normal Reporting Duration or 72h or less after end of encounter?

expression.expression: %inprogressencounter.where(status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration >= now() or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours >= now())).exists()
%termencounter.where((status = 'in-progress' and %encounterStartDate + 1 day * %normalReportingDuration < now()) or (status = 'finished' and %encounterEndDate + 72 hours < now())).select(true)

action.description: This action represents the creation of the eICR. It subsequently calls validate.
This action represents the validation of the eICR. It subsequently calls route-and-send.
This action represents the routing and sending of the eICR.
This action represents the start of the reporting workflow in response to the encounter-modified event
action.textEquivalent: Start the reporting workflow in response to an encounter-modified event

coding.display: Indicates modifications to data elements of an encounter

valueExpression.expression: Is Encounter Longer Than Normal Reporting Duration?
